original_text:
all the inhabitants of the earth are accounted as nothing,
    and he does according to his will among the host of heaven
    and among the inhabitants of the earth;
and none can stay his hand
    or say to him, “What have you done?”
korean_text: 땅의 모든 사람들을 없는 것 같이 여기시며 하늘의 군대에게든지 땅의 사람에게든지 그는 자기 뜻대로 행하시나니 그의 손을 금하든지 혹시 이르기를 네가 무엇을 하느냐고 할 자가 아무도 없도다

sentences.original_text: all the inhabitants of the earth are accounted as nothing
sentences.korean_translation: 땅의 모든 거민은 아무것도 여겨지지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: and he does according to his will
and among the inhabitants of the earth
and none can stay his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그의 손을 막을 수 없고
